name: SMS: Strenght and Magic in Synergy
name_original: SMS: Strenght and Magic in Synergy
description:
For the ENJMIN training camp ! A game jam for the participants of the ENJMIN
School entrance Exam :

Help the little knight to run his quest business app's . You can respond with all your might and intellect, with either muscle, or magic !

Inputs : Left/Right to move blocks

Up/Down to go faaast

By  :

Sothar : Graphist

MiamLesChocapic : Sound/Music

Horace As A Dino : Programmation
